meanings.definition: The amount that a car can hold.
meanings.sent1: Our carful of friends had a great time at the beach.
meanings.sent2: The carful of groceries barely fit in the trunk.
meanings.sent3: The carful of clowns made everyone laugh at the circus.
meanings.sent4: The carful of memories from our road trip will last a lifetime.
meanings.sent5: The carful of toys spilled out onto the floor, creating a colorful mess.

meanings.definition: The act of filling a car with passengers or cargo.
meanings.sent1: We made sure to do a carful before heading to the airport.
meanings.sent2: The carful of luggage made it difficult to see out the rear window.
meanings.sent3: The carful of balloons made the car float like a parade float.
meanings.sent4: The carful of secrets whispered between friends on the drive home.
meanings.sent5: The carful of laughter echoed through the vehicle as we drove along.
